lyric:
[by:Kongfuxu]
[ti:0]
[ar:0]
[al:0]
[by:0]
[offset:0]
[00:05.24]I was born by the devil
[00:07.16]I was left here to die
[00:09.29]I lost hell out of ransom on the cold summer sky
[00:14.58]I was told not to love him
[00:17.02]I was told not to try
[00:19.44]I was lonely the only till' he said he'd be mine
[00:24.49]He will leave me for younger
[00:26.92]He will leave me to cry
[00:29.16]Cut them night a little deeper
[00:31.86]Count the days I survived
[00:34.10]Yea!
[00:35.22]Its written in the water
[00:36.78]Yea!
[00:37.68]Its everywhere I go
[00:39.15]Tellin' me that I should leave you like i did two times before
[00:43.15]I define if I meant to
[00:46.95]When you still have had your own
[00:49.15]Give me one kiss for the road boy
[00:51.66]I guess its time I left you alone
[00:57.59]I will run to the river
[00:59.16]I will reach for the well
[01:01.65]Drown my sorrows for someone
[01:04.23]In my hope I leave this hell
[01:06.73]I can't live for forgiveness
[01:09.38]I can't live with the lie
[01:11.47]I won't be what you wanted
[01:13.96]No I won't be what you like
[01:16.52]Yea!
[01:17.41]Its written in the water
[01:19.25]Yea!
[01:19.94]Its everywhere I go
[01:21.68]Tellin' me that I should leave you like i did two times before
[01:25.51]I define if I meant to
[01:29.15]When you still have had your own
[01:31.71]Give me one kiss for the road boy
[01:34.14]I guess its time I left you alone
[01:57.03]Yea!
[01:57.48]Its written in the water
[01:58.94]Yea!
[01:59.80]Its everywhere I go
[02:01.13]Tellin' me that I should leave you like i did two times before
[02:06.55]I define if I meant to
[02:09.00]When you still have had your own
[02:11.28]Give me one kiss for the road boy
[02:13.96]I guess its time I left you alone
[02:17.59]Yea!
[02:18.33]Its written in the water
[02:19.08]Yea!
[02:19.50]Its everywhere I go
[02:21.18]Tellin' me that I should leave you like i did two times before
[02:23.98]I define if I meant to
[02:28.89]When you still have had your own
[02:31.26]Give me one kiss for the road boy
[02:33.75]I guess its time I left you alone
tlyric:
[by:绿叶墨影]
[00:05.24]我自邪恶之处生
[00:07.16]我在孤独之处死
[00:09.29]寒冷的夏日天空下，我迷失在无法赎罪的炼狱
[00:14.58]我被告诫不要爱上他
[00:17.02]我被警训不要尝试
[00:19.44]我曾经孤苦无依，直到他宣布他愿意归属于我
[00:24.49]但他却为了新欢把我抛弃
[00:26.92]但他却留我独自哭泣
[00:29.16]寂静无人的夜里它们伤我更深
[00:31.86]无助地计数着侥幸存活的日子
[00:34.10]好吧
[00:35.22]一切仿若昙花一现
[00:36.78]就这样吧
[00:37.68]所有我去过的地方
[00:39.15]都告诉我应该离开你，就像前两次那样
[00:43.15]如果我已下定决心我就能给出完美的解释
[00:46.95]你还是这样唯我独尊
[00:49.15]为了挑衅你的路边男孩就给我一个吻
[00:51.66]我猜是时候该抛下你了
[00:57.59]我会奔向湍急的河水
[00:59.16]我会填埋过去的深井
[01:01.65]为了某人我沉溺在伤痛中
[01:04.23]徒劳地期望着能离开这深渊
[01:06.73]只要我活着就无法原谅
[01:09.38]只要我活着就无法说谎
[01:11.47]我永远无法变成你想要的模样
[01:13.96]我永远无法成为你喜欢的人
[01:16.52]好吧
[01:17.41]一切仿若昙花一现
[01:19.25]就这样吧
[01:19.94]所有我去过的地方
[01:21.68]都告诉我应该离开你，就像前两次那样
[01:25.51]如果我已下定决心我就能给出完美的解释

[01:34.14]我猜是时候该抛下你了
[01:57.03]好吧
